name: NEFilterFlow
desc: The abstract base class for types that represent flows of network data.

items.name: var identifier: UUID
items.desc: The unique identifier of the flow.

items.name: var direction: NETrafficDirection
items.desc: The initial direction of the flow: incoming or outgoing.

items.name: enum NETrafficDirection
items.desc: A type to represent the direction of network traffic.

items.name: var sourceAppUniqueIdentifier: Data?
items.desc: A byte string that uniquely identifies the binary for each build of the app that is the source of the flow.

items.name: var sourceAppIdentifier: String?
items.desc: A string containing the identifier of the source app of the flow.

items.name: var sourceAppVersion: String?
items.desc: The short version string of the app that is the source of the flow.

items.name: var sourceAppAuditToken: Data?
items.desc: The audit token of the source application of the flow.

items.name: var NEFilterFlowBytesMax: UInt64
items.desc: The maximum number of bytes to be passed or peeked for a flow.
